name: @eventuateinc/eventuate-nodejs-client
description: NodeJS-based client for the Eventuate Platform

scripts.test: cd ./test && ../node_modules/.bin/mocha --timeout 25000 --reporter spec --ui bdd staticAPI-spec.js specialChars-spec.js Encryption-spec.js EventuateServerError-spec.js EventuateClient-spec.js EventuateClientEncryption-spec.js EventuateClientPromises-spec.js EventuateClientPromisesRetry-spec.js EventuateClientTriggeringEventToken-spec.js AckOrderTracker-spec.js stomp-spec.js subscribe-spec.js subscribeEncrypted-spec.js subscribeManyEvents-spec.js subscribeTwoSubscribers-spec.js subscribeWithOptions-spec.js AggregateRepository-spec.js AggregateRepositoryEncryption-spec.js AggregateRepositoryWithTriggeringEventToken-spec.js ObservableQueue-spec.js EventTypeSwimlaneDispatcher-spec.js
scripts.compile: rm -fr dist/* && node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js --presets es2015,stage-0 --plugins add-module-exports -d dist/ src/
